exposurecontrol: Programmed AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual exposure
weight: Approx. 15.5 oz. (including battery and memory card) Approx. 14.1 oz. (excluding accessories, battery and memory card)
sensitivity: AUTO1 / AUTO2 / AUTO3 (Control available up to ISO6400) Equivalent to ISO 200 - 6400 (Standard Output Sensitivity) Extended output sensitivity equivalent to ISO 100, 12800, 25600 and 51200
exposurecompensation: -3 EV to +3 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
batterylife: Approx. 330 frames (up to 700 frames when OVF POWER SAVE MODE is ON)
aperture: F2 - F16 1/3EV step (controlled with 9-blade aperture diaphragm)
focustype: Intelligent Hybrid AF (TTL contrast AF / TTL phase detection AF), AF assist illuminator available
movierecording: 1920 x 1080 pixels / 1280 x 720 pixels (60fps, 50fps, 30fps, 25fps, 24fps) with stereo sound
focallength: f=23mm, equivalent to 35mm on a 35mm format
movieformat: MOV (H.264, Audio : Linear PCM / stereo sound)
storagemedia: SD memory card / SDHC memory card / SDXC (UHS-I) memory card
shutterspeed: Mechanical Shutter (P mode) 4 sec. to 1/4000* sec., (All other modes) 30 sec. to 1/4000* sec. Bulb (max.60min.), Time 2 sec. to 30 sec. Electronic Shutter*3 1 sec. to 1/32000* sec. (P / A / S /M mode) Bulb / Time 1 sec. fixed Mechanical + Electronic Shutter*3 (P mode) 4 sec. to 1/32000* sec., (All other modes) 30 sec. to 1/32000* sec. Bulb (max.60min.), Time 2 sec. to 30 sec. Mechanical Shutter : Bulb - Mechanical Shutter limit Electronic Shutter : Mechanical Shutter limit - 1/32000 * F2 up to 1/1000 sec., 1/4000 sec. at F8 or smaller aperture
fileformats: JPEG (Exif Ver 2.3), RAW (RAF format), RAW+JPEG (Design rule for Camera File system compliant / DPOF-compatible)
viewfinder: Hybrid viewfinder Optical viewfinder (OVF) Reverse Galilean viewfinder with electronic bright frame display 0.5 x magnifications Coverage of frame area vs. capturing area : approx. 92% Electronic viewfinder (EVF) 0.48-in., Approx. 2,360K-dot color LCD viewfinder Coverage of viewing area vs. capturing area : approx. 100% 0.65 x magnifications Electronic rangefinder (ERF) Displays the enlarged focus area on the optical viewfinder Eye sensor installed Eye point Approx. 15 mm Diopter adjustment -2 - +1 m-1(dpt)
